column1: The curl commands that are in our docs had an upstream bug in them. They were not properly escaped.
This caused issues back in August/September and later
column2: while I was trying to write Komodo API and other preliminary docs.

column1: Dukeleto went and fixed this upstream bug. üòÉ Good man.
We can now more easily generate curl commands for each rpc.
Would you mind adding this to your to-do list?
curl commands are very useful for GUI developers and others integrating Komodo software.";"";"";
